tachyon.master

Class LocalTachyonMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.LocalTachyonMaster

  • public final class LocalTachyonMaster
extends Object
    Constructs an isolated master. Primary users of this class are the LocalTachyonCluster and LocalTachyonClusterMultiMaster. Isolated is defined as having its own root directory, and port.

      • create

        public static LocalTachyonMaster create()
                                 throws IOException
        Creates a new local tachyon master with a isolated home and port.
        Returns:
        an instance of Tachyon master
        Throws:
        IOException - when unable to do file operation or listen on port

      • create

        public static LocalTachyonMaster create(String tachyonHome)
                                 throws IOException
        Creates a new local tachyon master with a isolated port.
        Parameters:
        tachyonHome - Tachyon home directory, if the directory already exists, this method will reuse any directory/file if possible, no deletion will be made
        Returns:
        an instance of Tachyon master
        Throws:
        IOException - when unable to do file operation or listen on port

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the master.

        Returns:
        true if the master is serving, false otherwise

        public void stop()
          throws Exception
        Stops the master and cleans up client connections.
        Throws:
        Exception - when the operation fails

      • kill

        public void kill()
          throws Exception
        Kill the master thread, by calling Thread.interrupt().
        Throws:
        Exception - if master thread cannot be interrupted

                  throws IOException
        Clears all the clients.
